channel.title: Custom Domain on Jente Hidskes' website
channel.description: Recent content in Custom Domain on Jente Hidskes' website

item.title: This website is now HTTPS only again!
item.description: From today, my website enforces HTTPS again! Github Pages have been supporting HTTPS since June 2016, so when my website was reachable only through hjdskes.github.io I got all of that for free. In fact, because HTTPS is the future™, I enabled Github Pages’ enforce HTTPS feature in my website’s settings. Since March, my website is also reachable through (www.)hjdskes.nl. When I set this up, I knew I would the ability to enforce HTTPS because up until yesterday, Github Pages did not support HTTPS for custom domains.
